## About Laravel Reverb

Laravel Reverb brings blazing-fast and scalable real-time WebSocket communication directly to your Laravel application, and provides seamless integration with Laravelâ€™s existing suite of event broadcasting tools.

## Setup Project

### Install Composer
```shell
composer install
```

### Install npm
```shell
npm install
```

### Copy `.env` OR Create `.env` file from `.env.example`
```shell
cp .env.example .env
```

### Configure Database Connection
```dotenv
DB_CONNECTION=mysql
DB_HOST=127.17.0.1
DB_PORT=3306
DB_DATABASE=laravel_reverb
DB_USERNAME=root
DB_PASSWORD=
```

### Update `BROADCAST_CONNECTION` to `reverb`
```dotenv
BROADCAST_CONNECTION=reverb
```

### Migrate Database
```shell
php artisan migrate
```

### Install Laravel Reverb
```shell
php artisan reverb:install
```

### Start Reverb
```shell
php artisan reverb:start
```

### Run 
```shell
npm run dev
```
